0.1.name: wordpress/admin-colour
0.1.description: This plugin is for colour coding the admin menu. Users are able to define the colours they want in the plugins settings. I created the plugin to make it easier to switch between sections of the admin area when updating my wordpress websites. This plugin was created by Alex Wells while working as a Web Developer at Simpsons Creative
